text: Hi Karis, would be looking for something like this KB article? <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/email/create-marketing-emails-in-the-drag-and-drop-email-editor>

hi aj, thanks! i was looking for a more shallow version like training guide for dummies :sweat_smile: bc i think this would look overwhelming for them, but this is really helpful for me to write one specifically for them. thank u!!!
If you end up writing one please post it back to this thread. Would love to see what kind of guides devs are writing for clients! :simple_smile:
